title: Dissecting the infodemic: An in-depth analysis of COVID-19 misinformation detection on X (formerly Twitter) utilizing machine learning and deep learning techniques
content:
Publication date: 30 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 18

Author(s): Asma Ul Hussna, Md Golam Rabiul Alam, Risul Islam, Bader Fahad Alkhamees, Mohammad Mehedi Hassan, Md Zia Uddin
